text: يَتَخَـٰفَتُونَ بَيْنَهُمْ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا عَشْرًا

translation.en.sahih: They will murmur among themselves, "You remained not but ten [days in the world]."
translation.id.indonesian: mereka berbisik-bisik di antara mereka: "Kamu tidak berdiam (di dunia) melainkan hanyalah sepuluh (hari)"
